name: Nova hacking
body:
Here you'll find the implementation of two OpenStack blueprints. 

* [Open Cloud Computing Interface](https://blueprints.launchpad.net/nova/+spec/bexar-open-cloud-compute-interface)
* [SmartOS Support](https://blueprints.launchpad.net/nova/+spec/smartos-support)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
